attributes.action: child allowance based on household income
attributes.additional_details:
Take into account the household income for child allowance, not the single wage earner. Keep it fair and put the cap on the household, family 1- two members of household earning 39000 each (78000), rather than family 2- two members earning 40500 and 8000 (48500). Very unfair way of working.
Again the working class will suffer
